description: This is an artifically synthesized dense and mushy meal of varying flavors and ingredients, put into a common can. Due to preservatives it can still last forever outside of the can. While it has a lot of flavor, the texture is bad and there isn't that many varieties.

This biscuit is made from essence sludge that has been rendered safe to eat through refinement and cooking. It has an earthy taste, similar to some nuts or literal dirt, but being made from renewable ground sludge makes it cruelty free, some enjoy this. Having a high concentration of essence in a digestible form renders it calorie dense and full of vitamins.
This charge of energy made from Essence is used to get stuff you've summoned to follow you. It counts as dog food because that was the only way I could do it, abusing this is unintended.
